name: Cushcore XC Tire Inserts with Valve set
categories: Bike tire liners and rim tape
XC Tire Inserts with Valve set
description: Free your wheels from a life of servi-"tube".Durable foam inserts reduce the risk of pinch flats.CushCore 44mm Presta valves are precision-machined aluminum.Recommended inner rim width 22-32mm.Recommended rim height up to 30mm.Included: 2 valves, 2 tire inserts, rim stickers and valve core tool.
